author: Esther Emma
content:
haha, in dutch it has a total different meaning. here they call a little child 'puk'. it is a friendly way to say you are still litlle but we love you so much. that kind of way.
i never before did make the combination with the english version puke. what the word setsto a whole other level. ðŸ™‚)

i love the reflection in the puddle below. and of course that you focused for us on the strange puky thing ðŸ™‚
